welcome_message_body: Welcome to Poughkeepsie, where the charming historic district, scenic views of the Hudson River, and vibrant arts scene await you. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Big Tomato
restaurants.description: The Big Tomato is a breakfast spot located in Poughkeepsie.

restaurants.name: Brasserie 292
restaurants.description: Brasserie 292 is a french restaurant located in Poughkeepsie.

restaurants.name: Nelly's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Nelly's Restaurant is a spanish restaurant located in Poughkeepsie.

restaurants.name: Rosticceria Rossi & Sons
restaurants.description: Rosticceria Rossi & Sons is a deli located in Poughkeepsie.

restaurants.name: TJ'S Pizza
restaurants.description: TJ'S Pizza is a pizzeria located in Poughkeepsie.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dutchess County Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Stewart Airport handles all flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orange County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
